page.title: 10PEOPLE:HOME LIFE
page.content: My name is Rachel Spiller,my family and I moved down from Colchester Essex in 1982.When my dad left the Army we moved down here as it was his home as a little boy.He now works in Axminster and so does my mum as a teacher.As my dad was in the Army we moved to many places including Germany.We are a family of five living in a detatched house in the valley of the Kit just outside the main Chardstock Village,we live in the middle of surrounding countryside and fields.I myself go to the village school and my brother goes to Chard. I usually wake up at round about 6.30a.m.At 7.00a.m. I go down to the kitchen and have my breakfast of Rice Crispes and toast.At 8.30a.m.I start off to go to school on my bike.I arrive at school at 8.40a.m. and start my day at school.
